entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
